Title: pg_get_partkeydef
Description: Reconstructs the definition of a partitioned table's partition key, in the form it would have in the PARTITION BY clause of CREATE TABLE. (This is a decompiled reconstruction, not the original text of the command.)
EffectiveSQLsGenerated: SELECT pg_get_partkeydef(oid) FROM pg_class WHERE relname = 'your_partitioned_table';
EffectiveSQLs: SELECT pg_get_partkeydef(oid) FROM pg_class WHERE relname = 'your_partitioned_table';
